notes:
New creature in [[Updates/8.2|Summer Update 2008]], spawns near [[Alatar Lake]] with another green frog. Looks the same as a [[Green Frog]].
<gallery perrow="1" widths="100" heights="100px" mode="nolines">
First Boss Monster.jpg|The Frog Prince on [[Ocera]]
</gallery>
sounds: Perhaps a kiss might release me!
name: The Frog Prince
behaviour: Spawns with 4 [[Green Frog]]s. unlike the [[Green Frog]], he attacks players instead of running away from them. This creature runs away in dark yellow health with speed faster than that of a normal [[Green Frog]].
